page.title: 20Local Amenities
page.content: {SHOPPING}Hadlow and the area of Tonbridge that is in our study area have good shopping areas suitable for local requirements.In addition the shopping centres of central Tonbridge, Tunbridge Wells and Maidstone are within easy reach by bus. {LEISURE}Nearly all sports can be played in our study area.In Hadlow you can play cricket,bowls,badminton, football and tennis.Golf and squash can be played at Poult Wood.Other recreations such as swimming,canoeing and netball can be enjoyed at Tunbridge Wells. {THE RIVER MEDWAY}The Medway is used for canoeing,pleasure boat cruising and fishing.There are a number of footpaths,and these extend from the river and give access to most of our area.
